official_title: To amend the National Trails System Act relating to the statute of limitations that applies to certain claims.
short_title: Trails Act Technical Correction Act of 2007
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Trails Act Technical Correction Act of 2007 - Prescribes the times for filing a suit and for commencing a civil action by the owner of property subject to an interim use of railroad right-of-way for damage claims brought against the United States.

titles.title: Trails Act Technical Correction Act of 2007
To amend the National Trails System Act relating to the statute of limitations that applies to certain claims.
